modName: Midnight Breed Armor - CBBE UNP 7B - Modular with 5 Colors
summary: This armor set comes with 4k textures as well as optional 2k textures.   It is for CBBE, UNP and SeveNBase. All bodies have working weight sliders. This armor is completely modular, which means it can be separated into the following pieces:  Corset, Tights, Belts, Leg Strap, Boots, Gloves, Sleeves and Shoulders. The armor now comes in 5 colors.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://oi61.tinypic.com/rs4mdy.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]
[youtube]YBSNV6ilnzQ[/youtube][youtube]Ek4EXgF4qKk[/youtube][youtube]tcDFz9OuNrE[/youtube][youtube]78fmKuIoSlg[/youtube][youtube]0uDLl2GR7U8[/youtube][youtube]_MAKdvKaS_o[/youtube]


[color=red](PLEASE do not ask me to convert this to any other body. I already took the time to convert it to three different bodys)[/color]

[color=red]UPDATE: This armor now comes in 5 colors. I darkened the original and included brown, white, green and red in a single esp so you don't have to download them separately, they are all now in game. You can find the recolors in a chest at Belethor's, (check sticky post in comments section for exact location) Original must still be crafted.[/color]


The "Midnight Breed" is a black armor set that comes with 4k textures as well as optional 2k textures. It is for CBBE, UNP and SeveNBase. All bodies have working weight sliders.

[b]This armor is completely modular, which means it can be separated into the following pieces: Corset, Tights, Belts, Leg Strap, Boots, Gloves, Sleeves and Shoulders.[/b]

Please keep in mind that this armor was made to look good on the lowest body weight. Corsets in general to not look nice with bigger breasts, so I would recommend keeping it at a lower body weight. (Especially for SevenBase) Also note that in some of the images, the armor looks somewhat grey. I have darkened it since then!

The armor can be crafted under the "Leather" category. You can also find the armor by typing "help midnight" into the console.

This is my second and most likely last armor for Skyrim. I'm planning on practicing with weapons, jewelry and hair as well as mods for other games.[/center]

[line]
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/xfe1oj.png[/img]


[list][*]Cailenteâ€™s [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/]CBBE body[/url][/*]
[/list]
[i]or[/i]

[list][*]Dimon99's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709]UNP body[/url] [/*]
[/list]
[i]or[/i]

[list][*]Wast1980's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/]SeveNBase[/url][/*]
[/list]

[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/15mhjb7.png[/img]


[list]
[*]Download the main file that has your body type with the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager/?]Nexus Mod Manager.[/url][/*]
[*]If you want 2k textures, download them after following the first step.[/*]
[/list]
[b]If you choose to manually install the mod:[/b]

[list]
[*]Download the main file with your body type and extract the archive.[/*]
[*]Paste the Data folder in your Skyrim directory. Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim[/*]
[*]If you want 2k textures, download them after following the first step and paste the Data folder in your Skyrim directory. (Like you did with your main file.)[/*]
[/list]


[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2ekovhk.png[/img]


[list]
[*]Uninstall the main file with the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager/?]Nexus Mod Manager.[/url][/*]
[/list]
[b]If you choose to manually uninstall the mod:[/b]

[list]
[*]Delete the files in data/meshes/armor/Midnight and data/textures/armor/Shadoweave as well as deleting the .esp from your data directory.[/*]
[/list]


[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2uos4t5.png[/img]

1.2 - Made the original armor darker and included more colors. They are all included in the same esp so you can have them all in game.
1.1 - Fixed incorrect texture paths for the optional files
1.0 - Release


[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/qyyaky.png[/img]

The tights tend to clip when crouching. The gloves have some clipping issues as well when in first person mode. The armor may take a second to load up, but it shouldn't drop your performance. If it does, PLEASE download the 2k textures. Download the 2k textures will help with your performance.

Also, I'm not good with weight painting at all, so the belts don't look perfect when walking. I tried my best with them.

The sleeves don't show up in first person and I don't have an exact way to fix this.

If you spot anything else, please leave the issue in the comments section.


[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/fles8m.png[/img]

Please do not upload this to any other sites without asking me for permission first. If you want to convert this to another body type or do something else with this mod, PLEASE ask me before you convert the armor. (This means already starting to work on it before you message me.) If I don't reply within a month, you're free to do whatever you want with the mod as long as you credit me and link back to this page.

[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/12549lg.png[/img]


[list]
[*]3ds Max[/*]
[*]Headus UV Layout[/*]
[*]Creation Kit[/*]
[*]Gimp 2.8[/*]
[*]NifSkope[/*]
[*]WinRAR[/*]
[*]ZBrush[/*]
[/list]

[img]http://oi62.tinypic.com/2jv81s.jpg[/img]

[b][color=red]Q:[/color][/b] Can you convert this armor to ____________ body type?

[b][color=green]A:[/color][/b] No.



[b][color=red]Q:[/color][/b] Can this armor be improved?

[b][color=green]A:[/color][/b] Yes, but only the tights, corset, gloves and boots can be improved. I did this just so you couldn't improve all of the modular pieces and have a ridiculously powerful armor.



[b][color=red]Q:[/color][/b] Will you add any more colors?

[b][color=green]A:[/color][/b] I will probably only add them if they are highly demanded.



[b][color=red]Q:[/color][/b] Why didn't you make it so I could change the armor color in game?

[b][color=green]A:[/color][/b] I am planning to do this in the near future.




[b][color=red]Q:[/color][/b] Why does my FPS drop when I wear this armor?

[b][color=green]A:[/color][/b] Download the optional 2k textures.




[b][color=red]Q:[/color][/b] Why does it ask me to overwrite a file called "chitin_e_ebony.dds"?

[b][color=green]A:[/color][/b] I put the cubemap in just to be safe. If it asks you to overwrite, feel free to say "No".




[b]If you have any other questions, make sure it hasn't been answered in the description already. Otherwise leave the question in the comments section. ^_^[/b]

[line]

Big thanks to my good friend [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4559665/]Kalilies[/url] for putting all of the colors in one esp for me,
Thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3526455/]Cila81[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1924379/]TairenSoul[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5134496/]Shockero[/url] for testing out the armor and showcasing it.
Huge thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/259193/]SydneyB[/url] for helping me out step by step through several issues that I had.
Thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3330686/?]Caliente[/url] for making the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/]CBBE body[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/537675/]dimon99[/url] for making the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709]UNP body[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2304498/]Wast1980[/url] for making the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/]SeveNBase[/url] body.
Thanks to Bethesda for the awesome Black Briar logo on the flask as well.

I hope you all enjoy this armor set. Like I said above, this is most likely the last armor set I will be making for Skyrim. Keep an eye out for some of my other upcoming mods. ^_^
author: Stealthic
